People

Faculty with a core focus in machine learning

Attendees of MML span multiple faculties and departments across Stellenbosch University. Here we list permanent Stellenbosch faculty that consider their core research to be in machine learning. This includes both foundational and applied research.

Willie Brink

Willie works in computer vision and machine learning, and dabbles a bit in natural language processing.

Steve Kroon

Steve's research interests are machine learning theory, sequential decision making, and search techniques.
  • Email me

Wille Brink & Herman Kamper  •  2018  •  mml-stellenbosch.github.io
